text:
@charliekirk11 live in northern Illinois and it's shamefully sad that the kids who live in Dem-rundown Chicago have a 1000% chance to get shot/murdered by all the gun violence, than the 0.001% chance of contracting the coronavirus and spreading it! 

And that's #facts.

domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
